terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.mappers.intuitive
Class DirectSourceDragPlugin

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.mappers.intuitive.SourceDragMapperPlugin
      terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.mappers.intuitive.DirectSourceDragPlugin
Direct Known Subclasses:
AxisAngleSourceDragPlugin
public class DirectSourceDragPlugin
extends SourceDragMapperPlugin

A source drag mapper plugin that directly maps source drag value dimensions to target actuation value dimensions. All actuation value dimensions are affected.

The output actuation value is defined as follows:

  • X - Generic X actuation value.
  • Y - Generic Y actuation value.
  • Z - Generic Z actuation value.
  • W - Generic W actuation value

By definition, source space to actuation transformation is vector not point-based, which means that direction and magnitude are mapped but not position.

Constructor Detail

DirectSourceDragPlugin

public DirectSourceDragPlugin(javax.media.j3d.Node targetSpace)
Constructs a DirectSourceDragPlugin with default source mapping (i.e. X to X, Y to Y, Z to Z) and with the target space defined by the specified target node. Sets the target node's capability bits for live use.

Parameters:
targetSpace - Target space reference node. If null the world space will be used as the target space.

setSourceMap

public void setSourceMap(int mapX,
                         int mapY,
                         int mapZ)
Sets the source-side mapping from 3D source space to 3D target space, by source space dimension.

Parameters:
mapX - The target dimensions (Mapper.DIM_X/Y/Z) controlled by the source X dimension.
mapY - The target dimensions (Mapper.DIM_X/Y/Z) controlled by the source Y dimension.
mapZ - The target dimensions (Mapper.DIM_X/Y/Z) controlled by the source Z dimension.

setTargetMap

public void setTargetMap(int mapX,
                         int mapY,
                         int mapZ)
Sets the target-side mapping from 3D target space to 4D actuation space, by target space dimension.

Parameters:
mapX - The actuation dimensions (Mapper.DIM_X/Y/Z/W) controlled by the target space X dimension.
mapY - The actuation dimensions (Mapper.DIM_X/Y/Z/W) controlled by the target space Y dimension.
mapZ - The actuation dimensions (Mapper.DIM_X/Y/Z/W) controlled by the target space Z dimension.

toSourceValue

protected javax.vecmath.Vector3d toSourceValue(javax.vecmath.Vector3d value,
                                               javax.vecmath.Vector3d copy)
Performs the source-side vector processing, which includes scale, and then directly maps the 3D XYZ source space input value into a 3D XYZ target space value. All output dimensions are affected. Output values are accumulated by dimension.

Parameters:
value - Source value.
copy - Container for the copied return value.
Returns:
Reference to copy.

toTargetValue

public javax.vecmath.Vector4d toTargetValue(javax.vecmath.Vector3d value,
                                            javax.vecmath.Vector4d copy)
Performs the target-side vector processing, which includes offset, and then directly maps the 3D XYZ target space input value into a 4D XYZW actuation space value. All output dimensions are affected. Output values are accumulated by dimension.

Parameters:
value - Source value.
copy - Container for the copied return value.
Returns:
Reference to copy.
